title: Q1 Climate change (fr-en)
explanation: The notion of "climate" refers to all the elements that characterize the average state of the atmosphere. It is defined from statistics over a long period (often thirty years) while the notion of "weather" refers to the weather conditions of a given moment or a short period (a day, a week, etc.).
